column1: '''''Vinyar Tengwar''''' '''42''' is the forty-second issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal of the  [[Elvish Linguistic Fellowship]], devoted to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
* [[The Rivers and Beacon-hills of Gondor]] - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
** '''The above article is previously unpublished primary material from the Tolkien archives.''' Also included in this article is a [[Letter to Paul Bibire
column2: letter from Tolkien to Paul Bibire]].
